function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient information on sars-cov-2 and viral transmissibility","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close collaboration between different specialists required for calibrating models","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of sars-cov-2 and future pandemics necessitates enhanced collaboration and advanced research in building ventilation.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential impact of nanoparticles on human health and the environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and communication in implementing biofiltration technology in architectural design","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective infection control and prevention measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spreading of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in shared office spaces and co-working environments.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The potential for ongoing covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on telecommuting and digital communication leading to reduced social interaction","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible influx of covid-19 patients in temporary hospitals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus attacks on digital and built environment","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of estimating covid-19 prevalence based on sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in sewage.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sewage data serving as a sensitive tool for early warning of increasing virus circulation in the population.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scatter in combined data of all wwtp due to variations in virus rna recovery and concentration in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of virus in sewage before reported covid-19 cases in the population","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage and its correlation with reported covid-19 cases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage due to qrt-pcr assay limitations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage surveillance as a sole early warning system for re- emergence of covid-19 in cities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in domestic wastewater suggesting circulation of covid-19 in communities.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via respiratory droplets and fomites","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider migration patterns and isolation policies in the studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and limitations in understanding the impact of climatic variables on the spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding variables not identified in some studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of simple correlation in statistical analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex relationship between social and meteorological factors in coronavirus outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations in the identification of confounding factors impacting the final analysis of included articles","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of secondary data due to the urgency of the global situation with the rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extrapolation of results from studies conducted before the outbreak to the spread characteristics of covid-19 worldwide","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Methodological issues identified in the systematic review.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of bias in two studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of sars-cov-2.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moderate and low risk of bias in certain studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of sars-cov-2.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low certainty of evidence in studies on the association between temperature and humidity with the spread rate of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observational studies with inherent risk of bias in the assessment of climate variables","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Homogeneity of results among the included studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreviewed articles","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Confounding variables impact on disease spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias in included studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Homogeneity in the effect of temperature and humidity on the seasonal variability and spread of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate statistical analysis compromising conclusions about the effect of temperature and humidity on virus spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the impact of meteorological factors on epidemic trends","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retrospective observational studies associating weather variables with the spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in weather conditions beyond temperature and humidity","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in data collection dates and locations","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible inclusion of biased studies in the search results.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of study outcomes due to varying levels of evidence.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address potential conflicts and bias during study selection and evaluation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Systematic review on the emergence and replicability of the virus and its association with weather factors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on the influence of climate parameters on the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
